text: James Carson Yun (born May 13, 1981 in Hollywood, California) is an American former professional wrestler. He is best known for his time working for World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). He wrestled under the ring names Jimmy Yang, Akio and Jimmy Wang Yang. He also wrestled for World Championship Wrestling (WCW) when he was one of the Jung Dragons and was known as Yang and also wrestled for TNA Wrestling. He is currently wrestling in the independent circuit. He returned to WWE on October 25, 2021 and worked with them as a backstage producer until his release on December 28. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling alumni
title: James Yun
